scripts.drop: rimraf dist/ && babel ./ --out-dir dist/ --ignore ./node_modules,./.babelrc,./package.json,./npm-debug.log --copy-files && node -r dotenv/config dist/seeders/drop/index.js
scripts.seed: rimraf dist/ && babel ./ --out-dir dist/ --ignore ./node_modules,./.babelrc,./package.json,./npm-debug.log --copy-files && node -r dotenv/config dist/seeders/all/index.js
